favourite.article: Oh Lord draw me more and more each day!
Oh Lord, so many things weigh me down. Draw me away today and always. As long as I'm with You everything is okay.
Draw me, dear Lord! It doesn't really matter, Lord, as long as I gain You today! ❤️
Lord, Your bride loves You so much.
Draw us from everything else dear Lord to You today!
Oh Lord, draw me away from this wicked age. It's only when I'm near to You Lord that everything is okay! Oh Lord Jesus! May I gain You today!
Yes Lord Jesus, I pray that from anything else dear Lord, draw me away.
O Lord Jesus !! DRAW ME AWAY!! ♥♥
From everything else, dear Lord, we just turn to You! Draw us away dear Lord!
Lord draw me away. Away from anything that is not of You.
This song is my favorite. I like this.
Draw me dear Lord. Oh Lord Jesus...
Oh Lord Jesus! Draw us away from this wicked age today! Let us set our hearts on You Lord!
I love You Lord draw us.........every day until You come.
A great daily prayer. Oh Lord Jesus! Draw me away from the world! Gain me and use me!
Praise the Lord! Although everything falls apart or goes my way, IT JUST DOESN'T MATTER as long as I gain the Lord today! HAHA PRAISE THE LORD!
Whatever the world offers me, draw me away from all those things, draw me to You, dear Lord.
Draw me Dear Lord...
How I miss the church life in the Philippines. Lord have mercy on me, please draw me nearer each day to YOU though my life is a miss. Have mercy on me... I miss You Lord....
Jesus, please draw me nearer.
Wow we really have to ask the Lord to draw us to Him. If we are not prudent the world can suck us up. Oh Lord Jesus!!!!!:)
Lord, just gain me today!
I like this song very much. I remember when we serve in the Lord in Maitum preaching the gospel.

This song so touched me yesterday when I was attending the Lord's blending meeting. This world is weighing us down, sins within us, but when and only when the Lord is near us that everything will be ok.
There were so many things that I just couldn't let go, but Hallelujah! The Lord made them all fall apart!
My favorite hymn: so touching.
Yes Lord, and though everything may fall apart, and though everything go my way, it does not really matter Lord, as long as I gain You today.

I yearn to be closer to You dear Lord for I love and need You so much and desire to do Your will. May Your wisdom guide me and Your love shine through me. Thank You for loving me. Draw me closer, Amen.
Draw me more and more each day dear Lord!
Lord, become the greatest treasure in my heart. Subdue every corner of my being. Leave nothing for myself. I love You, Lord.
Lord I want to stay with You! cause only when I'm near You is everything okie! Everything may fall apart Lord, but it doesn't matter, as long as I gain You...
Praise the Lord, brothers and sisters. Hallelujah for the divine dispensing and the divine Trinity. Amen, Amen, Amen.
Lord, You are our comfort, draw me dear Lord... praise Him!

PRAISE THE LORD! Lord, draw me away from everything, draw me to You, to love You more each day. I love You, Lord. May we experience Your abounding grace and love in our daily living. Lord, we long to You. Amen.
Lord, draw me everyday, every moment! I love You.
Oh God, I really want You to draw me away, from everything else to You!!
Praise the Lord. Guide me, Lord Jesus. Draw me away from earthly doings and everything that will cause division of me and You, Lord Jesus. You are my everything....AMEN!!!!
Lord, I don't want to leave You. I want to be with You. Draw me from everything, set my heart on You. Let You be my center, to gain You in every matter.
There is no one like our God! He is the great I AM, perfect in every way. Holy and all powerful, praise to His Holy Name forever! This song sets the tone for putting Him above all else!
Lord Jesus, I Love You.
Everything may fall apart but it doesn't really matter Lord as long as I gain You. Draw me from everything else to You.
Praise the Lord. the more come to Him the more we draw to and sweeter He is.

I am so blessed, a sister in Lakewood, US sent me this hymn...very timely for what I am going through; very new and fresh. O Lord Jesus everything that is going throughout the world is uncertain and unsure. We praise You, Lord. You are the only ONE who is certain and sure. Draw me, Lord. If I miss You, Lord, then miss all. O Lord Jesus!!!

My prayer is that the LORD will draw me to Himself from everything. Yes, because only when He is near to Me, is everything okay. And though everything may fall may fall apart. Or everything go my way, It doesn't really matter, Lord, As long as I gain Him today.
Amen. It doesn't really matter, Lord, as long as I gain You today!!
I like this song cause it really touches my heart. Though everything may go wrong it really doesn't matter if you enjoy the riches of our dear Lord Jesus.

But Lord I want to set my heart, and Lord I want to stay with you because only when you're near to me is everything okay. Dan. 1:8, "But Daniel set his heart not to defile himself..." What a privilege to be a part of the Lord's move on earth today. The overcomers are those who are not defiled with the things of this world and who are pure and single for the Lord. Lord I want to set my heart, no matter what happens, I want to stay with you. May I be a part of Your corporate bride to bring You back.
O Lord Jesus........ I like this song very much. It is encouraging to me. Lord, I want to set my heart on You today.
